caption.p: Number of infants admitted to hospital with acute respiratory illness and the seasonality of RSV and MPV in Austria from 2000 to 2007 ( top panel). The weeks of onset and end of RSV and MPV activity ( bottom panel) are defined as the first of 2 consecutive weeks where >10 % of specimens test positive by PCR and the last week of >10 % positive preceding 2 consecutive weeks of <10 % positive. Gray indicates total tested; yellow, RSV; red, HMPV (Used with permission from Aberle et al. [ 298])
